thread.section_title: toolani Bewertungen | Kundenbewertungen von toolani | toolani.com
thread.title: AdeyiOA

author: AdeyiOA
title: AdeyiOA
text: This is by far the worst calling card ever. It hardly works and frequently asks you to use the UK calling cide even though that's already what is being used. It will sometimes fail to connect but other calling cards do. Then the recipients never know who's calling as toolani shows an Austria or some other random callerid at the other end. The voip app is a waste of money & time. Not worth it. Just stay away
